'''''Minecraft: Egyptian Mythology Soundtrack''''' is the fifth soundtrack for ''Minecraft'' released by [[Gareth Coker]], which contains music from the Egyptain Mythology mash-up pack. It was released on May 29, 2018, alongside the Legacy Console Edition update which added said pack.
